H0.text: What nation did the United States declare war on - after the sinking of the USS Maine. Germany

H1.text: What nation did the United States declare war on - after the sinking of the USS Maine. Japan

H2.text: What nation did the United States declare war on - after the sinking of the USS Maine. United Kingdom

H3.text: What nation did the United States declare war on - after the sinking of the USS Maine. SPAIN

A4.text: Spain and the U.S. declared war.

A5.text: The Spanish–American War (April 21 – August 13, 1898) was fought between Spain and the United States in 1898.
